name: alienvault-usm-anywhere
label: AlienVault USM Anywhere
description: AlienVault USM Anywhere Connector can be used to automate actions like get events, get event details, get alarm details, get alarms, get alarm labels, add alarm labels and delete alarm labels

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Server address of the AlienVault USM Anywhere server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: host

fields.title: Client ID
fields.description: Client ID to access the AlienVault USM Anywhere server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.description: Client Secret token to access the AlienVault USM Anywhere server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Alarms
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all alarms from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server or a list of alarms, based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: The page number (zero based) of results to return
parameters.description: Page number (zero-based) from which you want to retrieve results.
parameters.name: page

parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: The number of results to return for on each page
parameters.description: Number of results that the operation should include per page.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.tooltip: Set direction that the results should be sorted by
parameters.description: Parameter and direction based on which you want the operation to sort results.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: The status of the alarm
parameters.description: Status of the alarm based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: status

parameters.title: Suppressed
parameters.tooltip: Filter alarms by the suppressed flag
parameters.description: Select this checkbox, i.e., set it to True, to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server by the suppressed flag.By default, this is set as False.
parameters.name: suppressed

parameters.title: Rule Intent
parameters.tooltip: The intent of the rule that triggered the alarm
parameters.description: Intent of the rule that triggered the alarm, based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: rule_intent

parameters.title: Rule Method
parameters.tooltip: The method of the rule that triggered the alarm
parameters.description: Method of the rule that triggered the alarm, based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: rule_method

parameters.title: Rule Strategy
parameters.tooltip: The strategy of the rule that triggered the alarm
parameters.description: Strategy of the rule that triggered the alarm, based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: rule_strategy

parameters.title: Priority Label
parameters.tooltip: The priority of the alarm
parameters.description: Priority of the alarm based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: priority_label

parameters.title: Alarm Sensor Sources
parameters.tooltip: The uuid of the sensor
parameters.description: UUID of the sensor based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: alarm_sensor_sources

parameters.title: After Time
parameters.tooltip: Filtered results will include alarms that occurred after this time
parameters.description: Timestamp after which the filtered results will be retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, i.e., this operation will include alarms that occurred after this specified timestamp.By default, this is set as 24 hours. For example 2018-12-27T04:48:08.702Z.
parameters.name: timestamp_occured_gte

parameters.title: Before Time
parameters.tooltip: Filtered results will include alarms that occurred before this time
parameters.description: Timestamp before which the filtered results will be retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, i.e., this operation will include alarms that occurred before this specified timestamp.By default, this is set as 24 hours. For example 2018-12-27T04:48:08.702Z.
parameters.name: timestamp_occured_lte

operations.title: Get Alarm Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of alarms from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID's you have specified.

parameters.title: Alarm IDs
parameters.tooltip: List Alarm IDs (CSV/List format) to get its details
parameters.description: ID's of the alarms in csv or list format whose details you want to retrieve from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: alarmId

operations.title: Get Alarm Labels
operations.description: Retrieves a list of label IDs for a specific alarm from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alarm ID
parameters.tooltip: Alarm ID to get its labels
parameters.description: ID of the alarm whose list of alarm labels you want to retrieve from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: alarmId

operations.title: Add Alarm Label
operations.description: Adds a label to a specific alarm on the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID and label ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alarm ID
parameters.description: ID of the alarm to which you want to add the specified label on the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: alarmId

parameters.title: Label ID
parameters.description: ID of the label that you want to add to the specified alarm on the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: labelId

operations.title: Delete Alarm Label
operations.description: Deletes a label from a specific alarm on the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID and label ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Alarm ID
parameters.description: ID of the alarm whose label you want to delete from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: alarmId

parameters.title: Label ID
parameters.description: ID of the label that you want to delete from the specified alarm on the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: labelId

operations.title: Get Events
operations.description: Retrieves all events from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server or specific events, based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.tooltip: The account name
parameters.description: Account name of the event based on which you want to filter events retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Page
parameters.tooltip: The page number (zero based) of results to return
parameters.description: Page number (zero-based) from which you want to retrieve results.
parameters.name: page

parameters.title: Size
parameters.tooltip: The number of results to return for on each page
parameters.description: Number of results that the operation should include per page.
parameters.name: size

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.tooltip: Set direction that the results should be sorted by
parameters.description: Parameter and direction based on which you want the operation to sort results
parameters.name: sort

parameters.title: Suppressed
parameters.tooltip: Filter alarms by the suppressed flag
parameters.description: Select this checkbox, i.e., set it to True, to filter events retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server by the suppressed flag.By default, this is set as False.
parameters.name: suppressed

parameters.title: Plugin
parameters.tooltip: The plugin name
parameters.description: Name of the plugin based on which you want to filter events retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: plugin

parameters.title: Event Name
parameters.tooltip: The name of the event
parameters.description: Name of the event based on which you want to filter events retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: eventName

parameters.title: Source Name
parameters.tooltip: The source name
parameters.description: The source name
parameters.name: sourceName

parameters.title: Sensor UUID
parameters.tooltip: The uuid of the sensor
parameters.description: UUID of the sensor based on which you want to filter events retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: sensorUUID

parameters.title: Source Username
parameters.tooltip: The username of the person that triggered the event
parameters.description: Username of the person who triggered the event based on which you want to filter events retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: sourceUsername

parameters.title: After Time
parameters.tooltip: Filtered results will include events that occurred after this time
parameters.description: Timestamp after which the filtered results will be retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, i.e., this operation will include events that occurred after this specified timestamp.By default, this is set as 24 hours. For example, 2018-12-27T04:48:08.702Z.
parameters.name: timestamp_occured_gte

parameters.title: Before Time
parameters.tooltip: Filtered results will include events that occurred before this time
parameters.description: Timestamp before which the filtered results will be retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, i.e., this operation will include events that occurred before this specified timestamp.By default, this is set as 24 hours. For example, 2018-12-27T04:48:08.702Z.
parameters.name: timestamp_occured_lte

operations.title: Get Event Details
operations.description: Retrieves details for a specific event from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the event ID (UUID) you have specified.

parameters.title: Event ID
parameters.tooltip: Event ID(UUID) to get its details
parameters.description: ID (UUID) of the event whose details you want to retrieve from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.
parameters.name: eventId
